mapper.insert: insert into board (board_seq, mem_id, board_content, board_date, board_img) values(num_board.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{board_content}, sysdate, #{board_img})
mapper.select: select * from board order by board_seq desc

select * from (select rownum as r, x.* from (select b.*, (select count(*) from board_like l where l.board_seq = b.board_seq ) as board_likes, (select mem_img from member_info m where m.mem_id = b.mem_id) as mem_img, (select count(*) from board_cmt c where c.board_seq = b.board_seq) as board_cmt_cnt from board b order by b.board_seq desc) x) a where a.r between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum as r, x.* from (select b.*, (select count(*) from board_like l where l.board_seq = b.board_seq ) as board_likes, (select mem_img from member_info m where m.mem_id = b.mem_id) as mem_img, (select count(*) from board_cmt c where c.board_seq = b.board_seq) as board_cmt_cnt from board b where b.board_content like '%#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}%' order by b.board_seq desc) x) a where a.r between #{start, jdbcType=INTEGER} and #{end, jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from board_like where mem_id = #{mem_id} and board_seq = #{board_seq}
select count(*) from board_like where board_seq = #{board_seq}

select b.*,(select count(*) from board_like l where l.board_seq = b.board_seq ) as board_likes,(select mem_img from member_info m where m.mem_id = b.mem_id) as mem_img ,(select count(*) from board_cmt c where c.board_seq = b.board_seq) as board_cmt_cnt from board b where board_seq = #{board_seq}
